name: habitat-suitability-model-06_extract_environment

inputs.label: 01_setup output

inputs.label: pback month
inputs.description: pback month output from 05b sample background

inputs.label: pback decade

inputs.name: study_area
inputs.label: study area file
inputs.description: zip file containing the study area
